mapper.select: SELECT A.board_no AS boardNo, A.title AS title, A.contents AS contents, A.hit AS hit, A.image AS image, TO_CHAR(A.board_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS boardDt, TO_CHAR(A.board_time, 'HH24:MI:SS') AS boardTime, B.id AS userId FROM ucare.board A INNER JOIN ucare.user B ON A.user_no = B.user_no ORDER BY board_date DESC, board_no DESC

SELECT A.board_no AS boardNo, A.title AS title, A.contents AS contents, A.hit AS hit, A.image AS image, TO_CHAR(A.board_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS boardDt, TO_CHAR(A.board_time, 'HH24:MI:SS') as boardTime, B.id AS userId FROM ucare.board A INNER JOIN ucare.user B ON A.user_no = B.user_no WHERE board_no = #{boardNo }
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ucare.board(title, contents, hit, image, board_date, board_time, ins_no, user_no) VALUES( #{title }, #{contents }, 0, #{image }, now(), now(), #{insNo }, #{userNo } )
mapper.update: UPDATE ucare.board SET title = #{title }, contents = #{contents }, image = #{image }, upt_dt = now() WHERE board_no = #{boardNo }

WITH UPSERT AS ( UPDATE ucare.medicine SET symptom = #{symptom }, generic = #{generic }, price = #{price }, maker = #{maker } WHERE medicine_nm = #{medicineNm } RETURNING * )
INSERT INTO ucare.medicine ( medicine_nm, symptom, generic, price, maker ) SELECT #{medicineNm }, #{symptom }, #{generic }, #{price }, #{maker } WHERE NOT EXISTS(SELECT * FROM UPSERT WHERE medicine_nm = #{medicineNm })
